items.content: Hi there! I'm Buddy, your friendly talking watch! I can answer questions about anything in a super fun way! What would you like to know today?
Some dinosaurs were MUCH bigger than elephants! The biggest, like Brachiosaurus, were as long as three school buses! But some dinosaurs were tiny too - even smaller than chickens!
How do we know what dinosaurs looked like?

We know what dinosaurs looked like from their fossils! Scientists find dinosaur bones and footprints in rocks, and then they can figure out how big they were, how they moved, and sometimes even what color they might have been!

Some dinosaurs ate plants like trees and ferns - they were herbivores with flat teeth for chewing. Others were carnivores with sharp teeth for eating meat! And some ate both plants and meat, just like humans do!
